adminCli.setupPinProtectionDescription: This will require a 4-digit PIN for administrative operations.
adminCli.enablePinProtectionPrompt: Do you want to enable admin PIN protection?
adminCli.pinFormatError: ❌ PIN must be exactly 4 digits. Please try again.
adminCli.pinMismatchError: ❌ PINs do not match. Please try again.
adminCli.pinRecoveryWarning: ⚠️  Remember your PIN - it cannot be recovered if lost.
adminCli.setupPinProtectionFailed: ❌ Failed to setup admin PIN protection.
adminCli.invalidPinFormat: ❌ Invalid PIN format. PIN must be 4 digits.
adminCli.pinProtectionNotEnabled: Admin PIN protection is not currently enabled.
adminCli.confirmDisablePinProtection: Are you sure you want to disable admin PIN protection?
adminCli.disablePinProtectionFailed: ❌ Failed to disable admin PIN protection.
adminCli.protectionDetails: Protection: 4-digit PIN required for admin operations
